snippet: Delays, missed business appointments, a broken guitar — there are places that will help you lodge a complaint and get some satisfaction from the airline.
abstract: Airline passengers have taken to broadcasting their annoyance over flight delays and other travel annoyances; Twitter and YouTube posts are a way to vent frustrations and catch the attention of offending carriers for customers seeking redress.
lead_paragraph: Delays, missed business appointments, a broken guitar — there are places that will help you lodge a complaint and get some satisfaction from the airline.

headline.seo: Seeking Redress When Air Travel Goes Awry
headline.main: Seeking Redress When Air Travel Goes Awry
headline.print_headline: Seeking Redress When Air Travel Goes Awry
